coherent-module.description: A list to store all info about coherent-modules

slot-index.description: Index to select a optical module slot.
Index to select a optical module slot.

service-enable.description: Use this attribute to enable or disable service for controller optical module

description.description: Use this attribute to describe a coherent optical slot.

network-interface-loopback-type.description: Use this attribute to set all the network interfaces loopback type.

host-interface-loopback-type.description: Use this attribute to set all the host interfaces loopback type.

state.description: Operational state data for coherent module

events.description: Operational state data for module event counters

checksum-fault.description: Specifies checksum fault event count value.

hardware-fault.description: Specifies hardware fault event count value.

host-lane-out-of-alignment.description: Specifies host lane out of alignment event count value.

hardware-interlock.description: Specifies hardware interlock event count value.

initialization-fault.description: Specifies initialization fault event count value.

over-temperature-fault.description: Specifies over temperature fault event count value.

power-supply-fault.description: Specifies power supply fault event count value.

rx-loss-of-signal.description: Specifies rx loss of signal event count value.

rx-network-loss-of-lock.description: Specifies rx network loss of lock event count value.

tx-host-loss-of-lock.description: Specifies tx host loss of lock event count value.

tx-los-functionality.description: Specifies tx loss of signal functionality event count value.

slot-index.description: Index to select a optical module slot.

service-enable.description: Use this attribute to enable or disable service for controller optical module

description.description: Use this attribute to describe a coherent optical slot.

network-interface-loopback-type.description: Use this attribute to set all the network interfaces loopback type.

host-interface-loopback-type.description: Use this attribute to set all the host interfaces loopback type.

state.description: Operational state data for module info

host-interface-count.description: Specifies the number of ethernet non-optical ports supported for the optical interface.

coherent-module-type.description: Specifies the coherent optical module Type, currently supported module types are ACO and DCO.

presence.description: Specifies whether coherent optical module is Present in the slot.

state.description: Operational state data for module alarms

general-status.description: Specifies the current module general status, if any fault/status is present.

module-fault-status.description: Specifies the current module fault status, if any fault/status is present.

temperature.description: Specifies current module temperature alarm/warning status, according to the threshold value.

voltage.description: Specifies current module voltage alarm/warning status, according to the threshold value.

temperature.description: Terminal device module monitor temperature thresholds container

state.description: Operational state data for module monitor temperature thresholds

events.description: Operational state data for module event temperature related counters

high-alarm.description: Specifies temperature high alarm event count value.

high-warning.description: Specifies temperature high warning event count value.

low-alarm.description: Specifies temperature low alarm event count value.

low-warning.description: Specifies temperature low warning event count value.

high-alarm.description: Specifies current module temperature high alarm threshold value.

high-warning.description: Specifies current module temperature high warning threshold value.

low-alarm.description: Specifies current module temperature low alarm threshold value.

low-warning.description: Specifies current module temperature low warning threshold value.

voltage.description: Terminal device module monitor voltage thresholds container

state.description: Operational state data for module monitor voltage thresholds

events.description: Operational state data for module event voltage related counters

high-alarm.description: Specifies power high alarm event count value.

high-warning.description: Specifies power high warning event count value.

low-alarm.description: Specifies power low alarm event count value.

low-warning.description: Specifies power low warning event count value.

high-alarm.description: Specifies current module voltage high alarm threshold value.

high-warning.description: Specifies current module voltage high warning threshold value.

low-alarm.description: Specifies current module voltage low alarm threshold value.

low-warning.description: Specifies current module voltage low warning threshold value.

firmware-version.description: Specifies the CFP Vendor Firmware Version.

part-no.description: Specifies the CFP Vendor Part Number.

serial-no.description: Specifies the CFP Vendor Serial Number.

power.description: Specifies the CFP Module Power Supply.

shutdown.description: Indicates if coherent optical module is shutdown or not.
Indicates if coherent optical module is shutdown or not.

oper-status.description: Operational status of the coherent optical module.

interface.description: A list to store all network-interfaces

net-index.description: Index of network interface in a coherent optical module.
Index of network interface in a coherent optical module.

differential-encoding.description: Enable differential encoding on a optical network interface.

fec-mode.description: FEC mode for network interface. Default is 15per-denali.

frequency.description: Specifies the output laser frequency for the optical network interface in terms of Hz, MHz, GHz or THz.

loopback-type.description: Specifies the loopback type of the optical network interface. Default is none.

losi-enabled.description: Enable loss of signal alarm on a network interface.

modulation-format.description: Specifies the modulation format of the optical signal. Default is dp-16-qam.

operational-mode.description: Specifies the operational mode. The specified operational mode must exist in the list of supported operational modes supplied by the device

prbs-type.description: Simulate random data for transmission across the network interface if set. Default is none.

pulse-shaping-rx.description: Enable or disable rx pulse shaping of the signal.

pulse-shaping-tx.description: Use this attribute to to enable or disable pulse shaping

soft-tx-disable.description: Disable transmission of data on a network interface.

target-output-power.description: Specifies the output power of the optical network interface.

link-down.description: Configure the link to go down when it exceeds threshold values.

current-uncorrected-blocks.description: Specifies the Current Uncorrected Block-Count Value.

fec-uncorrected-blocks.description: Specifies the Uncorrected Fec Block Count value.

otn-sm-bip8-error.description: Specifies the OTN Section Monitoring BIP-8 Count Value.

net-index.description: Index of network interface in a coherent optical module.

differential-encoding.description: Enable differential encoding on a optical network interface.

fec-mode.description: FEC mode for network interface. Default is 15per-denali.

frequency.description: Specifies the output laser frequency for the optical network interface in terms of Hz, MHz, GHz or THz.

loopback-type.description: Specifies the loopback type of the optical network interface. Default is none.

losi-enabled.description: Enable loss of signal alarm on a network interface.

modulation-format.description: Specifies the modulation format of the optical signal. Default is dp-16-qam.

operational-mode.description: Specifies the operational mode. The specified operational mode must exist in the list of supported operational modes supplied by the device

prbs-type.description: Simulate random data for transmission across the network interface if set. Default is none.

pulse-shaping-rx.description: Enable or disable rx pulse shaping of the signal.

pulse-shaping-tx.description: Use this attribute to to enable or disable pulse shaping

soft-tx-disable.description: Disable transmission of data on a network interface.

target-output-power.description: Specifies the output power of the optical network interface.

link-down.description: Configure the link to go down when it exceeds threshold values.

line-port.description: Reference to the line-side physical port that carries this optical channel.

provisioned-channel-power.description: Specifies the current Provisioned Channel Power.

differential-group-delay.description: Specifies the current Differential Group Delay in pico second.

dsp-oper-status.description: Specifies the operational status of the Digital Signal Processor of the network interface in a coherent optical module.

osnr.description: Specifies the optical signal noise ratio.

oper-status.description: Specifies the operational status of the network interface in a coherent optical module.

instant.description: Specifies the current Chromatic Dispersion in pico second/nano meter.

post-voa-power.description: Container for network-interface POST VOA power

instant.description: Specifies the current POST VOA Power.

instant-provisioned-channel.description: Specifies the current Post VOA Provisioned Channel Power.

laser-age.description: Specifies the Tx Laser Age in Percentage.

current-ber-period.description: Specifies the current Bit Error Rate Period in milliseconds.

current-post-fec-ber.description: Specifies current POST FEC Bit Error Rate per 1e-18 BER Period.

current-prbs-ber.description: Specifies Current PRBS Bit Error Rate value divided by 1e-18.

current-pre-fec-ber.description: Specifies the current PRE FEC Bit Error Rate per 1e-18 BER Period.

config.description: Configuration data for network-interface monitor thresholds

chromatic-dispersion-threshold.description: Specifies chromatic dispersion threshold event count value.

osnr-threshold.description: Specifies osnr threshold event count value.

q-margin-threshold.description: Specifies Q margin threshold event count value.

rx-los.description: Specifies rx los event count value.

rx-power-threshold-events.description: Container for network-interface rx power threshold count

high-alarm.description: Specifies input power high alarm threshold event count value.

high-warning.description: Specifies input power high warning threshold event count value.

low-warning.description: Specifies input power low warning threshold event count value.

low-alarm.description: Specifies input power low alarm threshold event count value.

pre-fec-ber-threshold-events.description: Container for network-interface PRE FEC BER threshold count

signal-degrade.description: Specifies pre fec ber signal degrade threshold event count value.

signal-fail.description: Specifies pre fec ber signal fail threshold event count value.

tx-power-threshold-events.description: Container for network-interface tx power threshold count

high-alarm.description: Specifies output power high alarm threshold event count value.

high-warning.description: Specifies output power high warning threshold event count value.

low-warning.description: Specifies output power low warning threshold event count value.

low-alarm.description: Specifies output power low alarm threshold event count value.

signal-failure.description: Set pre fec ber threshold value for signal failure.

signal-degrade.description: Set pre fec ber threshold value for signal degrade.

clear.description: Set pre fec ber threshold value for clear.

tx-power-threshold.description: Container for network-interface output power threshold

high-alarm.description: Specifies current network interface tx output power high alarm threshold.

high-warning.description: Specifies current network interface tx output power high warning threshold.

low-alarm.description: Specifies current network interface tx output power low warning threshold.

low-warning.description: Specifies current network interface tx output power low alarm threshold.

permissible-rx-power-threshold.description: Container for network-interface permissible input power threshold

high-alarm-max.description: Specifies current network interface rx input power maximum permissible high alarm threshold.

high-alarm-min.description: Specifies current network interface rx input power minimum permissible high alarm threshold.

high-warning-max.description: Specifies current network interface rx input power maximum permissible high warning threshold.

high-warning-min.description: Specifies current network interface rx input power minimum permissible high warning threshold.

low-alarm-max.description: Specifies current network interface rx input power maximum permissible low alarm threshold.

low-alarm-min.description: Specifies current network interface rx input power minimum permissible low alarm threshold.

low-warning-max.description: Specifies current network interface rx input power maximum permissible low warning threshold.

low-warning-min.description: Specifies current network interface rx input power minimum permissible low warning threshold.

chromatic-dispersion.description: Specifies current netif chromatic dispersion alarm status.

input-power.description: Specifies current netif rx input power alarm/warning status.

output-power.description: Specifies current netif tx output power alarm/warning status.

q-margin.description: Specifies current netif q-margin alarm status.

pre-fec-ber-signal.description: Specifies the signal degrade/fail alarm based on Pre-FEC BER.

rx-los.description: Specifies current netif rx loss of signal status.

rx-odu.description: Specifies current netif rx optical data unit frame status.

rx-opu.description: Specifies current netif rx optical payload unit frame status.

rx-otu.description: Specifies current netif rx optical transport unit frame status.

rx-training-sequence.description: Specifies current netif rx training sequence status.

osnr.description: Specifies current netif snr alarm status.

interface.description: A list to store all host-interfaces

host-index.description: Index of host interface in a coherent optical module.
Index of host interface in a coherent optical module.

loopback-type.description: Loopback type for host-interface. The default value is none.

host-index.description: Index of host interface in a coherent optical module.

fec-type.description: Fec type for host-interface. The default value is none.

loopback-type.description: Loopback type for host-interface. The default value is none.

egress-pcs.description: Specifies current Host interface Egress PhysicalCodingSublayer Status.

assignments.description: Store the network-interface and ethernet interface assigned to the    host-interface

ethernet-interface.description: Specifies the mapped ethernet interface name

operational-modes.description: Container for a list of operational modes pre-defined by vendor

mode.description: List of operational modes supported by the platform. The operational      mode provides a platform-defined summary      of information such as symbol rate, modulation, pulse shaping, etc.

state.description: Operational state data for terminal devices

description.description: Vendor-supplied textual description of the characteristics of this operational mode to enable operators to select the appropriate mode for the application.

vendor-id.description: Specifies the coherent optical module vendor name

options.description: Set TAI debug for Module/Netif/Hostif in config mode.
Set TAI debug for Module/Netif/Hostif in config mode.
